comment.body:
Well, if it was only for writing, I would suggest a Raspberry powered laptop, but since you want something powerful enough to also use it instead of your main laptop, I would suggest maybe look at the used marked?
You don't miss anything, laptop and derivative (like tablet with keyboard) do cost more brand new.
I had to find a laptop for a relative with a price of 300 €, I only found a good deal in the used market.

Usually good battery life come from low powered devices (or one with smart battery and CPU managment).

So, an used Surface maybe?
